name: lost in time
notes:
this pattern can be customized to make any size you wish with any yarn or hook size. 

getting an exact gauge is not critical but your gauge will affect yarn quantities needed and finished measurements.

for more information, yarn suggestions and pictures please visit my blog. all of the available translations are linked as pdf files there.

for more patterns and crochet inspiration please [visit my linked blog][1].

❀❀❀

join my facebook group:

my facebook group [mijo crochet hangout][2] is a social group where you can get support and be inspired by other fellow crocheters. welcome!


  [1]: https://mijocrochet.se/
  [2]: https://www.facebook.com/groups/mijocrochethangout/
